tech_demo

Class ReactiveDemo

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • tech_demo.ReactiveDemo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer

    public class ReactiveDemo
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.util.Observer
    Implements a couple of simple animations to be displayed on the Launchpad S whenever the user presses a pad.
    Include a few command specific pads which are:
    - [0][2] Previous Animation
    - [0][3] Next Animation
    - [0][7] Quit Reactive Demo

    Animations available:
    - Plus
    - Star
    - Fireworks
    - Random line
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Helion

      • Star

        private void Star(boolean b)
        Animations a Plus or a Star based on input parameters
        Parameters:
        b - If false, display only a Plus. Otherwise display a Star

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable received,
                   java.lang.Object arg1)
        This method is instantly called whenever an input is received. This will extract the X and Y coordinates and call the currently selected animation
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        received - Observable
        arg1 - Object
        See Also:
        Observer.update(Observable, Object)
